member.name: T:Dos.Check
member.summary:
Design By Contract Checks.
Each method generates an exception or a trace assertion statement if the contract is broken.

member.name: T:Dos.DesignByContractException
member.summary: Exception raised when a contract is broken. Catch this exception type if you wish to differentiate between any DesignByContract exception and other runtime exceptions.

member.name: T:Dos.ORM.FastInvokeHandler

member.summary: Delegate to set an arbitrary property at runtime.
member.param: the object instance whose property will be modified.
